io.sphere.sdk.productdiscounts

Interface ProductDiscountValue

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbsoluteProductDiscountValue, ExternalProductDiscountValue, RelativeProductDiscountValue

    public interface ProductDiscountValue
    Defines discount type with the corresponding value. The type can be relative or absolute.
    See Also:
    RelativeProductDiscountValue, AbsoluteProductDiscountValue, ExternalProductDiscountValue
